fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 178.55 lakh crore compared with Rs 135.19 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 13.20 points or 0.07% to settle at 17,662.15 The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, dropped 4.71% to 16.88. Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone (APSEZ) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
